channel.title: CVE Feed for OpenText™ -- Network Node Manager i (NNMi)
channel.description: The latest CVEs for OpenText™ -- Network Node Manager i (NNMi)

item.title: CVE-2024-7428|2024-08-23T18:58:01.620Z -- opentext%E2%84%A2 -- network%20node%20manager%20i%20%28nnmi%29
item.description: URL Redirection to Untrusted Site ('Open Redirect') vulnerability in OpenText™ Network Node Manager i (NNMi) allows URL Redirector Abuse.This issue affects Network Node Manager i (NNMi): 2022.11, 2023.05, 23.4, 24.2.

item.title: CVE-2024-7428|2024-08-23T17:05:35.345Z -- opentext%E2%84%A2 -- network%20node%20manager%20i%20%28nnmi%29
item.description: URL Redirection to Untrusted Site ('Open Redirect') vulnerability in OpenText™ Network Node Manager i (NNMi) allows URL Redirector Abuse.This issue affects Network Node Manager i (NNMi): 2022.11, 2023.05, 23.4, 24.2.

item.title: CVE-2024-7427|2024-08-23T17:05:37.231Z -- opentext%E2%84%A2 -- network%20node%20manager%20i%20%28nnmi%29
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in OpenText™ Network Node Manager i (NNMi) could allow Cross-Site Scripting (XSS).This issue affects Network Node Manager i (NNMi): 2022.11, 2023.05, 23.4, 24.2.
